name: Terminal Velocity (itch) (Nitricswight_dev)
description:
Terminal Velocity is a grapple-hook platformer about reaching your maximum speed. This isn't like your OTHER grapple hook platformers. Here, we give you TWO grapple hooks (you can thank us later).  Swing around, dodge hazards, and get to the flag in the lowest time possible.

CONTROLS

left click to shoot out your swing hook

right click to shoot out your spring hook

R to restart

SHIFT to toggle the minimap

STATUS

currently in development. Level design be hard bro. Expect more levels soon. Feedback is very important in this stage, so any feedback is greatly appreciated!
